Uses of Class
items.Item

Packages that use Item 
Package Description
animals
Custom animal object logic and structure created for Farm Simulator game
crops
Custom crop object logic and structure created for Farm Simulator game
farm
Contains data structures and logic unique to the farm simulator.
items
Custom item objects created for Farm Simulator game Contains the structure for an item object and the unique constructors for the item subclasses.

  • Uses of Item in animals

    Methods in animals with parameters of type Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Animal.feed​(Item item)
    Updates object attributes consistent with feeding the animal with an item as a daily action.
    void Animal.play​(Item item)
    Updates object attributes consistent with playing with the animal with an item as a daily action.

  • Uses of Item in crops

    Methods in crops with parameters of type Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Crop.tend​(Item item)
    Updates object attributes consistent with tending the crop with an item as a daily action

  • Uses of Item in farm

    Methods in farm that return types with arguments of type Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.Dictionary<FarmItem.FarmItems,​Item> ItemFactory.GetAllItems()
    Supplies a Dictionary of all available Item objects within the game, keyed with a String that is the Items's "name"
    java.util.ArrayList<Item> Store.getItems()
